text: Joseph Adolph Sonnabend (6 January 1933 â€“ 24 January 2021) was a South African physician, scientist and HIV/AIDS researcher. He was known for his research and awareness campaign about safe sex to prevent STDs and AIDS. Sonnabend had a heart attack on 3 January 2021. He died on 24 January at a London hospital at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Medical researchers Category:South African scientists Category:Physicians Category:South African writers
title: Joseph Sonnabend
